Text.Page:
You're the new , eh?

Good—I need your help. I ran out of materials to make magic paper, which we use to record observations when our hands are too occupied to write.

To make more paper, we need lard wood. And we obtain it—yes, the hard way—from forest guardians and shamans in Bluefirst Mountain.

Go, go, go! I need lard wood immediately!

Faster than I thought, . I'm impressed.

We're always going to need magic paper, and thus we're always going to need lard wood. Keep that in mind when you visit us.
Without magic paper, my—I mean, "our"—brilliance will be unrecorded! Fetch some straightaway.
